pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automatically Generate _site.yml File for 'R Markdown' // The goal of 'siteymlgen' is to make it easy to organise the building of your 'R Markdown' website. The init() function placed within the first code chunk of the index.Rmd file of an 'R' project directory will initiate the generation of an automatically written _site.yml file. 'siteymlgen' recommends a specific naming convention for your 'R Markdown' files. This naming will ensure that your navbar layout is ordered according to a hierarchy.
